channel.title: christmas on Tokyo, endless city
channel.description: Recent content in christmas on Tokyo, endless city

item.title: Tokyo Tower through the trees
item.description: Last Christmas Eve I approached Tokyo Tower from a new angle for me and saw it rising as if from a forest. The Tower really is the centre about which Tokyo spins. So long a symbol of the city and still, even with the modern prevalence of high-rise buildings, visible all over the city.
